name: One Room Repair
description:
Game for Ludum Dare 37

Ok, first plan was to make interest game, where you playing as noisy neighbor. But because lack of time 80% of planned game content was cutted.

Now we have only hammer. And you can make some noise in room. After that your angry neighbor will come and.. you'll see how much he is angry =)

That's my first jam! That was coool!
